answer_spacing.description: The spacing in pixels between two answer bubbles horizontally.

bubble_ratio.description: The ratio of the bubble size to the text letters for Answers.

bubble_shape.description: The shape of the answer bubble: ['circle','square','rectangle','oval']

bubble_size.description: The bubble size in pts like 12pt or 15pt

dpi.description: Dots per inch which specifies how much detail is saved in the image. 300 is standard for good images, I chose 288 because it is a factor of ???

font_alpha.description: The opaqueness of the font (see through layer) from 0 - 100 where 0 is totally solid and 100 is clear.

font_path.description: The font location. Will also load italics, bold, and bold-italics if they exist.

font_size.description: The default font size if none is specified.

img_align_path.description: The path and name of the image to help with identifying and aligning the picture of the answer sheet.

label_spacing.description: Padding in pixels between label and bubble

label_style.description: Style string for the A B C .... (tbd)

line_spacing.description: Padding in pixels between lines of answers

num_questions.description: Number of questions to place in answer sheet.

num_coolumns.description: Force a specific number of columns. Not implemented.

outName.description: The file name of the answer sheet when its saved. Default uses a naming convention.

outPath.description: The location to save the answer sheet. Default is current directory.

page_gutters.description: The spacing between columns of answers.

page_margins.description: The spacing between page egdes and the text: [Top, Right, Bottom, Left]

que_ident_style.description: The style of each question identifier. Example: 1. or 1) or 1:

zebra_shading.description: Place shade behind alternating lines? None for no, or some color for yes. E.g. (200,200,200) or hex color.
